title: Democracy Is A Full-Contact Sport (with DeNora Getachew)
description:
DeRay, Brittany, Clint, and Sam discuss California's police policies, high interest loans, food safety risks, and how McKinsey helped the Trump administration. DeRay talks to DeNora Getachew from Generation Citizen.

https://thehill.com/opinion/energy-environment/461774-risking-food-safety-usda-plans-to-let-slaughterhouses-self-police

https://www.propublica.org/article/they-loan-you-money-then-they-get-a-warrant-for-your-arrest

https://twitter.com/samswey/status/1202723007942340609?s=21

https://www.propublica.org/article/how-mckinsey-helped-the-trump-administration-implement-its-immigration-policies


https://quip.com/SaveThePeople

Casper.com/DERAY100, use DeRay 100 at Checkout

Babbel.com, promo code PEOPLE
